## What’s missing or unclear?

Which page or section (e.g. readme, `docs/openclaw_integration.md`, MVP spec), and what you’d like added or clarified.

## Suggested change (optional)

If you have a concrete suggestion (e.g. a sentence or example), paste it here.

## Context

Why this would help (e.g. you got stuck here, it’s ambiguous for new users, etc.).
